title: All buildings having height more than ground floor shall have provision of one staircase
clause_text: All buildings having height more than ground floor shall have provision of one staircase. The special buildings specified in Regulations No.1.3(93)(xiv) shall have two staircases out of which one shall be fire escape staircase.
